0.4.name: wordpress/rcr8-widget
0.4.description:
Add outdoor activity resources to your site. For publishers, bloggers, sports and outdoor retail industry specialty stores, travel sites, etc... Add outdoor activity location maps for free.

Add relevant content to your site. Its free and incredibly easy. Just copy and paste.

Put the RCR8 widget on your site and immediately give your readers a way to find places for outdoor activities. Customize the widget with your colors, for your location, or for a specific activity type. Make it work for you.

Perfect for:

  • Bloggers
  • Media Companies
  • Municipal Sites
  • Federal and State Parks
  • Niche and Extreme sports
  • Community Organizations
  • Parenting and Family
  • Travel
  • Your exclusive special area of expertise

RCR8 content is a perfect compliment to sites with content on specialized sports, entertainment recreation, family friendly tips, geographic interest, and just about anyone wh
